episodes.synopsis: When the new leader of the Conservatives snubs Urquhart following his narrow win, Urquhart begins a ruthless pursuit of the lofty office for himself.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Still pursuing his attempt to supplant Collingridge, Urquhart gains the support of a media powerhouse in a quest to stain the reputation of the PM.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Urquhart's devious schemes have helped make Collingridge's position unstable, but a young political journalist suspects the PM may have been framed.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: With Collingridge's downfall complete, Urquhart prepares to take over as prime minister as journalist Mattie Storin continues her investigation.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When the new King expresses a desire to reshape British society, Urquhart -- now prime minister -- feels that his power is being threatened.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: As the King continues to push for changes that threaten the government, Urquhart calls for a general election in an attempt to regain momentum.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A televised speech by the King turns public opinion against the government, and Urquhart finds his grip on power slipping as his popularity wanes.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: With his party trailing badly in the polls as the election approaches, Urquhart must take desperate steps to ensure the continuation of his reign.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Approaching the end of his political career, Urquhart agrees to use his influence to adjust international sea boundaries for an oil company.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Urquhart helps a Greek Cypriot girl find the war graves of her uncles, while Claire Carlsen curries favor with Urquhart to land a prominent job.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Urquhart's poor decisions lead to a decline in the prime minister's support. Later, he finds himself facing allegations of a cover-up in Cyprus.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: In response to political turmoil in Cyprus, Urquhart authorizes the use of military force, but several innocent schoolgirls are killed as a result.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: House of Cards Trilogy (BBC)
video.synopsis: After he's passed up for a promotion, British politician Francis Urquhart vows to exact revenge on the system that's holding him back.
